caption: This is honestly the most lackluster meal I have ever had. The warm bowl was cold, the veggies and rice were dry and flavorless, and it looks like a toddler chucked it in a bowl and threw it down the stairs. I will not be ordering from here again.
I prefer to avoid rude people, so just go across the street and get a sandwich. I work in the area, so you lost potential regular customer.
I was so stuffed. Prices were decent. Feels like a place in Los Angeles I loved.
got there near seven, it wasn't very crowded. definitely worth going back to. the bill was decent for the quality.
arrived at seven, it wasn't crowded. prices are appropriate. mood here is similar to fresno's scene.
service treated us so kindly. bring your appetite because portions are generous.
you will not be disappointed in the menu and service. quick and friendly service. the prices are well within reason for the quality. like a restaurant in washington i loved.
staff is always timely even when they have a full house. fast and courteous service. the place has a great feel to it.
My favorite of the salads places. This location is well run. It gets super busy during lunch time but they manage to keep up with the pace!
1st time: shop forgot my dressing 2nd time: stale dump of spinach 3rd time: there won't be one.
This is the worst salad I ever tasted. Not only is the salad bad but its so overpriced too. Smh waste of money.
Great salads. Nice clean place

Asked for light dressing... got a huge squirt of Buffalo and the mixer just kept mixing without me getting a chance to ask her to remove some. There was no rush, it was just me in the line.  Aside from poor service like this, decent salad spot.
Love this place - a great option for eating healthy and eating delicious! My man Franco always hooks up great salads :)

Avoid this place - they nickel and dime their customers. They charged me a $1 for dressing on the side, they charge if you substitute toppings from the signature salads, and they only offer 3 free basic toppings as opposed to other mainstream fast casual salad spots that offer 4.

I custom make my salad every time I go. I would honestly eat here everyday but fear that I would turn green from all the salad I eat. Their smoothies are delicious and healthy. Their cookies are small but good for you and delicious.
My Daily Rise & Grind for R. Double Dutch

Pros - Good fresh and healthy food, friendly staff, quick service, clean.  Cons - very limited countertop seating despite having a spacious floor that can fit several tables. Most customers take food to go back to their office, but i dont work in the area
A.M.A.Z.I.N.G
Great salad . Well cleaned environment

Just salad is my togo place. But i m very unhappy with what they served me today. I took a cold bowl. It has only romaine. I asked for corn and chick peas topping. I hardly found them. Mistake was i just informed her the toppings and i was on call. I didnt notice when it was prepared. I asked for sauce toppings. She didn’t respond and she closed the bowl. When i asked wat about the sauce, she just opened nd added on top. I m very very unhappy. And I am not coming back. This is not the way u serve a regular customer.
Salad .customizable. no complaint
Sweetgreen is better, but way more pricey. This is a good compromise, and the line isn't insane like chopt.
One of the best salas I've ever tried! Fresh ingredients! Really worth it!
Ok. I don't know what the big deal is about...but ....
Dead bug in my salad... luckily I noticed before I ate, but beware!
Great selection at good prices. Fresh and healthy food.

I enjoy their specials where you get two items for 11.99 . Around Wall St that is a steal. Food is fresh and the servings are huge. However the last time I went one of the staff who was preparing my food was very surly,  you could see she did not want to be there and it showed by the way she prepared my food. Just a tip if your having a bad day you shouldn't work with the customers,  had it been my first time there I wouldn't have returned because of the service from that employee.  Everyone else was great.
One of my favorite salad places that has great ingredients. Also offers reusable bowls.

This place is absolutely amazing! The food is delicious and the staff is beyond beautiful, especially Daris.  The manager Franco is doing an excellent job.  Great energy in here! I will for sure be back. #ItsGreat2BeBlake
Thanks to Stephanie for great service and salad!

I love Just Salad** and go to this one because it’s near my apartment.  I must say the staff are only so so friendly.  Could definitely be better  ** I support Just Salad because they have good ingredients are reasonably priced and the bring your own bowl is a great way to reduce your plastic footprint.
I get a salad from here almost everyday and never have any issues with service or the food. Stephanie is always super kind and remembers my name.
Tastes great! Nice and fresh!
The carnitas bowl is the best

Really disappointing. I wouldn't go back. Too much dressing ( I had to pour it out of the puddle in my bowl). I wasnt given an option of how much I wanted. At least it added flavor even if it was just vinegar as the other salad we ordered was downright bland.
Great kale salad 🥗!
Good food great prices
Just Salad used to be my favorite lunch spot back when it was actually serving just salads. I can't say I'm a fan of the menu changes, and the customer service here sucks during the lunch rush.
Food is good but staff is just terrible! No manners or common sense of customer service.
These guys are awesome!  Special shout out to Raymond, Abraham, Monique and Marcus.
Chicken chipotle cowboy. Big line order online. Fairly priced. Pretty good.

Used to be my go to salad place, but they removed many of their salad options and half their menu is no longer salad related.  Seems like they should change their name when they now focus on avacado toast.

You got a raise they cut your hours, if you make a lot of hours let's say 35 to 40hr that means you are new employee or working with a low payment. This company use a lot of taticts against employees, to get more benefits including the CEO and couple district managers that wanna be wiser pressuring store managers to cut labor hahaha and in the same manner want to employees work happy and hard. Don't be stupid dear managers and CEO. This is XXI century. Be fair with employees and the service will improve by itself. I worked almost 4 years in this company no recommended no even for low skill workers.
good price and salad nicely done
Nice salad options aviliable
The salads are fresh and tasty
Just salad = quick service and moderate price!
Your imagination is your limitation when choosing which salad you like. My only grip is cost but in fairness all other salad places cost about the same.
Great option for a healthy and fast meal

The ingredients are good and fresh, which is great enough to me. You do not eat salads for the sauces and cooking skills.  Besides fresh, this location and the Broadway+Park PL location surprised me with their friendly service. I was expecting the typical "I do not give a damn" customer service attitude. However, the salad choppers at both locations were friendly. The Bdwy+Park PL chopper put so much care into my salad I had to tell him he was too serious, because its JUST A SALAD.  Good to know there are still fast food establishments in NYC, where the training puts emphasis on friendly and professional customer service. They convincingly earned my business.
Still good but I feel like the quality has decreased over time. Buy the $1 reusable bowl and get 2 free toppings every visit!
Good place to just quickly grab salad
Custom are always first and so i thought this place Sucks and they are Racist-but then again that's is in most area's i will never go there again yuk

Complete FAIL, ordered lunch at 11:07 and it's 1:07 now and still no order. Called the restaurant and they said guy was out already 30 min ago. There's no reason that an order for a simple salad should take more than two hours, the only good thing is that they fixed the situation

They don't clean their board, blade or tong - don't be surprised if you order a Cobb salad but taste peanut sauce! Their cutting board always look so nasty and the employee are slow not to mention incredibly rude. DO NOT GO.

Since my favorite salad spot recently changed its menu and purged my two favorite salads I was in search of a new home for my leafy palate.  My new spot is now this Just Salad location.  There is nothing like having an extensive salad menu for those of us who are easily overwhelmed by more than three options. If your prefer your own masterpiece, they have you covered there as well with a spread of fixings for your perusal. Also noteworthy is the long list of interesting dressings. I can have a completely different salad every day with so many choices without fear of burnout.  If you want to save some money or the environment (or both!) they offer reusable  colorful bowls you bring back for two free toppings, though I still need to warm to the idea of walking around Manhattan with a bowl.  Where do I put it?  Service is quick and staff is very friend.  Don't let the chaotic lines during lunch hour scare you away.This is after all the Financial District where people literally grab-and-go dine.  This has been my salad spot for a couple weeks and I highly recommend it.

I am so tired of coming to this location. The service is completley unorganized from all angle. The cashiers by the register are completely rude, they are either distracted on thei phones or having conversations in spanish.I came here for lunch with an associate from work and the store had an distinctive  dirty mop smell it was disgusting.The food that was on display was looking completely not fresh and when I tried to complain to the manager he was too busy shouting orders. The employees by the register just looked at me like an typical angry complaining customer and laughed. I will never come eat here again ..This location is a complete waste of time of promoting good customer service.

Just Salad may be a chain but as salads go, I was pretty impressed with the selection and the prices were, while overpriced for food in general, were relatively in line with what I've seen as far as other salad places. I really like the way they cooked the tofu here as it felt far less mushy and far more flavorful than other places. I was also presently surprised by the Tofu Ceasar Wrap. The cheese and tofu combination was really delicious and since they have this through Seamless as well it's going to be my mainstay for a healthy meal.
Awesome salads
Expensive but delicious
